column3: Latest;Banteay Meanchey province:------ Two suspects were arrested by the Banteay Meanchey Anti-Narcotics Police Office in collaboration with the Poipet police force with nearly 5 kg of drugs.------The raid was carried out at 3pm on April 26
column7: Banteay Meanchey province.------Two suspects were identified as  a 32-year-old Thai and a Khmer male
column12: Banteay Meanchey province.------For captured exhibits include:The seizure totalled over 2kg of methamphetamine (ice) and 3kg of methamphetamine WY ‘yama’ tablets. ------https://tvfb.news/article/20587
